overview: Jane Maynard opens a mission in memory of philanthropist Bland Hendricks. John Anstell, son of a powerful and selfish millionaire, Michael Anstell, falls in love with Jane, to the old man's disapproval. Anstell tries to undermine Jane's work by hiring reporter Tom Barnett to write an unfavorable story about the mission.
tagline: A story of an unscrupulous millionaire- a clever newspaper man and "Jane"-whose faith in the elemental goodness of mankind provides a drama to think about as well as to enjoy!
title: The Day of Faith
